TopicTitle: How do I change my Avatar?

Articles.Content:
I go to my "Edit Avatar" and I can't choose a custom avatar?

What is going on?

When you first join the forum, there are some limits on your account until the software is sure you're not a spambot. (Also gives us a chance to take cussy words out of your posts.) Anyway, post a few more times and your account status will change, and then you'll gain the ability customize your profile.
